header_text: The bank just alerted you of an upcoming bill. You go online to make a payment and struggle pressing the keys, causing it to display the incorrect card number. You pause, dial the bank's number, and pay the bill over the phone.

elements.Text: Are you able to find a way to pay the bill?

elements.name: The bank just alerted you of an upcoming bill. You go online to make a payment and struggle pressing the keys, causing it to display the incorrect card number. You pause, dial the bank's number, and pay the bill over the phone._Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
